PROPER_NAME: This is displayed in the tooltip.
DESCRIPTION: This is displayed in the tooltip. Spaces should not be used be avoided in NAMES, with the exception of multi-word keywords (see next entry).
Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
At the start of your turn draw 1 extra card if you have at least 3 Flow stacks and lose 1 stack of Flow.
Attack damage received deal 50% damage and consume 1 stack. Get entangled if losing all stacks.
Whenever you play a card this turn, the targeted enemy loses HP.
Deal increased damage and become Intangible.
The next time you are attacked, deal damage back.
Burnt creatures lose HP at the end of their turn. Each turn, Burnt is reduced by half.
Whenever Pressure triggers, creatures lose HP.
Activates when played as the 1st, 3rd, 5th, etc., card in a turn.
Activates when played as the 2nd, 4th, 6th, etc., card in a turn.
Activates when played as the third card in a turn.
